name: we are broken
description:
You are in a dark room.
The vampire in front of you wants to know where is the human resistance hideout. You must resist.
Be unbreakable or be broken.

we are broken is an interactive fiction dark game about not giving up.

Nikos is a man embittered who lives in the shadow of an old sacrifice.
Carl is the most loyal scout in the human resistance, but his siblings are also a priority.
Ruby is a badass woman with a dark past. Her tongue is sharp, but her wounds are deep.
